Details.Name: sc_card_name
Details.Feature: OCBC Frank Card

Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: Doubles as an ATM and EZ-Link Card with an auto top-up function.
6% rebate when shopping with selected online merchants.
Exclusive Frank card member deals with selected merchant partners.

Details.Name: sc_sup_annual_fee
Details.Feature: N/A

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Fee Waiver

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Accumulate a minimum spend of S$500 a month for the 6% rebate, otherwise 0.5% rebate on all spend.

Details.Name: sc_cashback_details
Details.Feature: 6% rebate on online shopping
3% rebate on first 2 top-ups for NETS FlashPay ATU
0.3% rebate on everything else
Up to 5% rebate for entertainment
Min. spend $400 exclude online spend and ATUs, capped at $60 for all rebates

Details.Name: sc_dining_details
Details.Feature: Up to 50% off at restaurants, hotels, fast food outlets, cafÃ©, desserts, and many more
Min. spend $400 exclude online spend and ATUs, capped at $60 for all rebates
0.3% rebate on everything else

Details.Name: sc_entertainment_details
Details.Feature: Earn 5% rebate on weekend entertainment (Fri-Sun) and 3% on weekday entertainment (Mon-Thur)
Min. spend $400 offline (exclude online and ATUs), capped at $60 for all rebates
Get 4 movie tickets for the price of 3 at GV

Details.Name: sc_grocery_details
Details.Feature: 6% rebate on online shopping
0.3% rebate on everything else
Min. spend $400 exclude online spend and ATUs, capped at $60 for all rebates

Details.Name: sc_petrol_details
Details.Feature: 14% savings at Esso, Caltex (5% onsite + 5% loyalty + 4% card)

Details.Name: sc_shopping_details
Details.Feature: 6% rebate on online shopping
0.3% rebate on everything else
Min. spend $400 exclude online spend and ATUs, capped at $60 for all rebates
